feed.title: Formbricks Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Formbricks: v3.11.0
entry.content:
With this release, we replaced the old DISABLE_USER_MANAGEMENT environment variable with a new variable USER_MANAGEMENT_MINIMUM_ROLE and updated functionality. It now controls which user roles can access the user management section in Formbricks. The accepted values are:

  • owner: Only users with the owner role can manage users.
  • manager: Both owners and managers can manage users.
  • disabled: No role can manage users; the functionality is completely disabled.

If you were previously using the DISABLE_USER_MANAGEMENT variable, please make sure to update its value accordingly to reflect the new behavior.

We also removed HTTPS enforcement for the Management API in this release to allow more flexible setups. If you want your API to be accessible only via HTTPS, please ensure your setup enforces this accordingly. Our One-Click setup handles HTTPS enforcement by default, so no additional action is needed if you're using it.

What's Changed

  • chore(deps): upgrade npm dependencies in /packages by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5807
  • fix: promise misuse error by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5783
  • fix: suid bugs by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5780
  • fix: token permisson issues by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4986
  • feat: implement user management role configuration and access control by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5808
  • fix: build process warnings by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5734
  • chore: removes https enforcement from management api by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5810

Full Changelog: https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/compare/v3.10.3...v3.11.0

entry.title: New release for Formbricks: v3.12.0
entry.content:
With Formbricks v3.12.0, the default session max age has been updated from 1 hour to 24 hours. You can now configure this value using a new environment variable SESSION_MAX_AGE. This variable accepts the session timeout duration in seconds. For example, to set a 12-hour session timeout, you would use SESSION_MAX_AGE=43200.

What's Changed

  • chore: swap next and back button input by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5748
  • fix: user attributes updates api email fix by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5827
  • chore: track server action with sentry and general fixes by @victorvhs017 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5799
  • fix: unknown property warnings by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5800
  • feat: download selection of responses by @jakobsitory in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5488
  • fix: env-var-generation in mac os for self-hosting by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5814
  • fix: non-interactive elements without roles by @victorvhs017 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5804
  • docs: documentation of multi-tenancy of Formbricks Cloud by @jobenjada in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5835
  • fix: fix icon in new docs page by @jobenjada in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5836
  • fix: slow responses query slowing down database by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5846
  • fix: delete pre-filled value by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5839
  • fix: response getting stuck by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5849
  • feat: Make session maxAge configurable with environment variable by @devin-ai-integration in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5830
  • fix: tweaks in open text question by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5841
  • feat: added email change feature by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5837
  • chore: canonical seo issue by @harshsbhat in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5852
  • fix: 602 modal height on small screens by @jakobsitory in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5863
  • chore: add no index for survey pages by @harshsbhat in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5859
  • fix: rtl issue in open text placeholder by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5855
  • fix: issues in the email change feature by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5868

New Contributors

  • @devin-ai-integration made their first contribution in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5830

Full Changelog: https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/compare/v3.11.0...v3.12.0

entry.title: New release for Formbricks: v3.13.0
entry.content:
Important Change for Helm Chart Users: With this release, the default setting for rate limiting has changed from disabled to enabled.

If you wish to manually disable rate limiting, please set the following environment variable in your configuration:

RATE_LIMITING_DISABLED=1

What's Changed

  • fix: Update JS SDK log messages for clarity by @devin-ai-integration in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5819
  • fix: multiple close function calls because of timeouts by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5886
  • fix: performance issues on survey summary by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5885
  • fix: weak cipher suite usage by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5873
  • chore: enable rate limiting by default in helm chart by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5879

Full Changelog: https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/compare/v3.12.0...v3.13.0

  • fix: ciphers issue for fb staging by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5908

entry.title: New release for Formbricks: v3.14.0
entry.content:
This release introduces audit logs as a new enterprise add-on, along with significant performance improvements for cluster setups using a dedicated Redis cache.

What's Changed

  • feat: audit logs by @victorvhs017 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5866
  • feat: add security headers for Referrer-Policy and Permissions-Policy by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5877
  • chore: Comprehensive Cache Optimization & Performance Enhancement by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5926
  • chore: switch curl images to quay.io by @d3vb0ox in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5916
  • fix: backspacing headline causing infinite loop by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5891
  • fix: language tweaks by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5933
  • fix: back button in survey published modal closes modal instead of navigating by @ar-chit in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5831

New Contributors

  • @ar-chit made their first contribution in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5831

Full Changelog: https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/compare/v3.13.1...v3.14.0
